sentences.english: An act or instance of cringing.
sentences.chinese: 帶有媚態和奉承的順從。

sentences.english: Obsequiousness of the woman is born from love.
sentences.chinese: 媚態之於女人是由情而生。

sentences.english: She is being charming at the party.

definition: lit. hiding the moon, shaming the flowers (idiom)/fig. female beauty exceeding even that of the natural world
to have bright eyes and white teeth
to like looking attractive (usually of girls)/aestheticism
to make up/elaborately made up woman
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful
inked line/carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)
lit. a white cloud transforms into what looks like a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world
old and decrepit/proud of one's age and experience (idiom)
